statements: SELECT * FROM dance_choreography WHERE choreography_id = 1;
SELECT choreography_name, music_artist FROM dance_choreography WHERE music_title = 'ABC';
SELECT * FROM dance_choreography WHERE music_artist = 'XYZ' ORDER BY choreography_id DESC;
SELECT choreography_name, costume_details FROM dance_choreography WHERE choreography_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT choreography_name, dance_sequence FROM dance_choreography WHERE music_title LIKE '%Song%' ORDER BY music_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM dance_choreography WHERE choreography_id = 1;
SELECT choreography_name, music_title, music_artist FROM dance_choreography ORDER BY choreography_name DESC;
SELECT choreography_name, dance_sequence FROM dance_choreography WHERE music_artist = 'Michael Jackson';
SELECT choreography_name, costume_details FROM dance_choreography WHERE costume_details LIKE '%sparkly%';
SELECT COUNT(choreography_id) AS total_choreography FROM dance_choreography;
SELECT * FROM choreography WHERE music_id = 1;
SELECT choreography_name, sequence_id FROM choreography WHERE costume_id = 5;
SELECT music_id, music_name, artist_name FROM music WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM choreography ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT music_name, genre FROM music ORDER BY music_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM choreography;
SELECT choreography_name, music_name FROM choreography JOIN music ON choreography.music_id = music.music_id;
SELECT choreography_id, choreography_name, artist_name FROM choreography JOIN music ON choreography.music_id = music.music_id WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT choreography_id, choreography_name, music_id FROM choreography WHERE sequence_id = 1 ORDER BY choreography_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_choreographies FROM choreography;
SELECT * FROM choreography_details;
SELECT choreography_name, music_id FROM choreography_details ORDER BY music_id DESC;
SELECT music_name, music_genre FROM music_details WHERE music_genre='Pop';
SELECT costume_color, costume_designer FROM costume_details WHERE costume_type='Dance';
SELECT choreography_name, music_duration FROM choreography_details JOIN music_details ON choreography_details.music_id = music_details.music_id;

SELECT choreography_name, music_genre, costume_designer FROM choreography_details
JOIN music_details ON choreography_details.music_id = music_details.music_id
JOIN costume_details ON choreography_details.costume_id = costume_details.costume_id
WHERE music_genre = 'Pop';

SELECT choreography_name, music_name, costume_type FROM choreography_details
JOIN music_details ON choreography_details.music_id = music_details.music_id
JOIN costume_details ON choreography_details.costume_id = costume_details.costume_id
ORDER BY choreography_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music;
SELECT music_title, artist FROM music ORDER BY music_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM costumes WHERE color='Red';
SELECT sequence_name, choreography FROM sequences WHERE sequence_type='Dance' ORDER BY sequence_name;
SELECT music_title, length FROM music WHERE length > '3 minutes';
SELECT * FROM music;
SELECT music_title, artist FROM music ORDER BY artist ASC;
SELECT sequence_name, choreographer FROM sequences WHERE sequence_type = 'Dance';
SELECT music_title, artist, length FROM music WHERE length > '00:03:00';
SELECT * FROM costumes WHERE color = 'Red' AND material = 'Silk';
SELECT * FROM choreography;
SELECT choreography_id, dance_name FROM choreography;
SELECT music.music_title, performers.name FROM music, performers;
SELECT sequence_id, step_description FROM sequences ORDER BY step_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM costumes WHERE color='red';
SELECT * FROM choreography;
SELECT music_title, artist FROM music WHERE music_id = 1;
SELECT costume_name, color FROM costumes ORDER BY costume_name DESC;
SELECT choreography_id, dance_name, music_id, costume_id FROM choreography WHERE dance_name = 'Salsa';
SELECT * FROM sequences WHERE step_number > 3 ORDER BY step_number ASC;
